articles.title: Severe Covid-19 patients at greater risk of post-infection symptoms: ECDCs - Business Standard
articles.description: Individuals who are severely affected by Covid19 may be at higher risk of postinfection symptoms the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control ECDC said
articles.content:
Individuals who are severely affected by Covid-19 may be at higher risk of post-infection symptoms, the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) said.

articles.title: Haunting Sound Of Earth's Magnetic Field Released By European Space Agency - NDTV
articles.description: Scientists took magnetic signals measured by ESA satellites and converted them to sound to release a five-minute spooky audio.
articles.content:
Earth's magnetic field protects us from cosmic radiation and charged particles.
The European Space Agency (ESA) has released a spooky, crackling audio which reveals how the Earth's magnetic field so… [+2065 chars]
